categories: Category:Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook fiction

nodes.text: Temporary Reassignment is a short narrative appearing in the Shadows of the Empire Sourcebook, written by Peter M. Schweighofer.

The story details the temporary reassignment of Admiral Firmus Piett from the Super Star Destroyer Executor to the Star Destroyer Accuser while Darth Vader returns to Coruscant following his duel with Luke Skywalker on Cloud City.
